description: The French president adds that he cannot accept that depicting the Prophet Muhammad justifies violence.
title: Macron 'can understand' Muslims' Muhammad cartoons shock
title_page: Macron 'can understand' Muslims' Muhammad cartoons shock - BBC News
maintext: "I understand the sentiments being expressed and I respect them. But you must understand my role right now, it's to do two things: to promote calm and also to protect these rights," he said, referring to the freedom of expression of those who created the cartoons.
